requests.name: Create
requests.docs:
# Create User

## Request

| Body             | Type     | Description                        |
| :--------------- | :------- | :--------------------------------- |
| `email`          | `string` | **Required, must be a valid email**|
| `password`| `string` | **Required**, must be longer than 6 char |

```json
{
  "email": "fake_email@gmail.com",
  "password": "fakepassword"
}
```

## Response

| Body             |  Code      |  Description                        |
| :--------------- | :-------   | :--------------------------------- |
| `empty`          |   `201`    | **Created**          |
| `json`           |   `409`    | **Conflict**, the user already has an account |
| `json`           |   `400`    | **Bad Request**, invalid request data |

requests.name: Sign In
requests.docs:
# Sign In

## Request

| Body             | Type     | Description                        |
| :--------------- | :------- | :--------------------------------- |
| `email`          | `string` | **Required, must be a valid email**|
| `password`| `string` | **Required**, must be longer than 6 char |

```json
{
  "email": "fake_email@gmail.com",
  "password": "fakepassword"
}
```

## Response

| Body             |  Code      |  Description                        |
| :--------------- | :-------   | :--------------------------------- |
| `json`          |   `200`    | **OK**, returns a token          |
| `json`           |   `401`    | **Unauthorized**, wrong credentials |
| `json`           |   `400`    | **Bad Request**, invalid request data |

```json
{
  "user": {
    "id": 1,
    "email": "fake_email@gmail.com"
  },
  "token": "eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9.eyJ1c2VySWQiOjEsImlhdCI6MTY2NjQ2OTE0Mn0.nreP3FJjEwohfnSynLniZ6XvhpV_HX8-FYGufb9k41c"
}
```

requests.name: Get Default Event
requests.docs:
# Get Default Event

## Response

| Body             |  Code      |  Description                        |
| :--------------- | :-------   | :--------------------------------- |
| `empty`          |   `200`    | **OK**          |
| `json`           |   `404`    | **Not Found**,  event not found|

```json
{
  "id": 1,
  "title": "Driven.t",
  "backgroundImageUrl": "linear-gradient(to right, #FA4098, #FFD77F)",
  "logoImageUrl": "https://files.driveneducation.com.br/images/logo-rounded.png",
  "startsAt": "2022-10-22T20:00:51.138Z",
  "endsAt": "2022-11-12T20:00:51.138Z",
  "priceId": 1
}
```

requests.name: Get Event Prices
requests.docs:
# Get Event Prices

This is an authenticated route.

## Response

| Body             |  Code      |  Description                        |
| :--------------- | :-------   | :--------------------------------- |
| `empty`          |   `200`    | **OK**          |

```json
{
  "id": 1,
  "online": 10000,
  "inPerson": 25000,
  "withHotel": 35000,
  "withoutHotel": 0,
  "createdAt": "2022-10-22T20:00:51.132Z",
  "updatedAt": "2022-10-22T20:00:51.134Z"
}
```

requests.name: Create Registration
requests.docs:
# Create Registration

This is an authenticated route.

## Request

| Body             | Type     | Description                        |
| :--------------- | :------- | :--------------------------------- |
| `type`          | `string` | **Required, accept only 'online' and 'inPerson'**|
| `charge`| `number` | **Required**, must be greater than zero |

```json
{
  "type": "online",
  "charge": 1000
}
```

## Response

| Body             |  Code      |  Description                        |
| :--------------- | :-------   | :--------------------------------- |
| `empty`          |   `201`    | **Created**          |
| `json`           |   `409`    | **Conflict**, the user already has a registration |
| `json`           |   `400`    | **Bad Request**, invalid request data |
